name: AGSA Fastpitch
tagline: Competitive and recreational girls fastpitch softball in Avenel, New Jersey.
description: AGSA Fastpitch provides a positive, high-quality softball program focused on development, teamwork, and sportsmanship.

announcement.label: Registration Open
announcement.message: Spring/Summer registration is now open for all divisions.

getInvolved.title: Coach With AGSA
getInvolved.description: Lead a team and help players grow on and off the field.

getInvolved.title: Volunteer
getInvolved.description: Support events, field prep, and game-day logistics.

getInvolved.title: Become an Umpire
getInvolved.description: Join our officiating crew for rec and tournament play.
